name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 13+ years of experience in designing and implementing **microservices** architecture using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, **Spring Data JPA**, and **Spring Security**. Proven expertise in deploying scalable applications with **Docker** and orchestrating containerized applications with **Kubernetes**. Strong background in database management with **PostgreSQL** and caching mechanisms with **Redis**.
Skilled in Agile methodologies and proficient in using **JIRA** for project management. Recognized for strong leadership qualities and effective communication skills. Additionally, experienced in developing high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Angular**. Familiar with compliance-driven development, ensuring alignment with standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS, and have hands-on practices in automation and testing with **JUnit** and **Test Containers**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed microservices architectures using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Data JPA**, ensuring robust and scalable solutions for high-demand applications.
• Implemented security protocols leveraging **Spring Security** and **OAuth2** to protect sensitive user data and maintain compliance with industry standards.
• Collaborated in Agile teams using **JIRA** for project management and sprint planning, ensuring timely delivery of features while promoting effective team communication.
• Led integration efforts using **Docker** to containerize applications and streamline deployment processes in various environments, enhancing developer productivity and minimizing system conflicts.
• Optimized data storage solutions with **PostgreSQL** and **Redis**, achieving an increase in application efficiency by **30%** in response times during peak usage.
• Conducted rigorous testing with **JUnit** and **Test Containers**, establishing test-driven development practices that improved code quality and reduced bugs by **25%**.
• Drove the adoption of SOLID principles and Design Patterns, fostering better code maintenance and scalability across multiple microservices.
• Successfully managed the Kubernetes orchestration platform, utilizing best practices for deployment and scaling that resulted in a **40%** reduction in downtime.
• Mentored junior developers, boosting team performance through training in best practices, coding standards, and effective problem-solving strategies.
• Facilitated cross-functional communication between development, QA, and operations teams, fostering a collaborative and high-performance culture within the organization.
• Promoted and maintained a culture of continuous improvement and commitment to high-quality software delivery, aligning with organizational goals.

Implemented microservices architecture to modernize core financial systems, utilizing **Java** with **Spring Boot** and **Spring Data JPA**, boosting scalability and enabling efficient management of high-volume transactions.
Enhanced system security through **Spring Security** and **OAuth2**, ensuring stringent access control across financial applications.
Led the development of containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated them with **Kubernetes**, improving deployment efficiency and reliability by **30%**.
Utilized **PostgreSQL** for robust data storage solutions, ensuring data integrity and optimized query performance with fast, reliable responses.
Developed unit and integration tests using **JUnit** and **Test Containers**, achieving over **85%** code coverage to ensure software quality and reliability.
Championed Agile methodologies and utilized **JIRA** for efficient project management and coordination across cross-functional teams.
Fostered open communication and leadership within the development team, facilitating knowledge sharing and mentoring of junior engineers to build a cohesive and high-performing team.
Practiced **SOLID** principles and **Design Patterns** to enhance code maintainability and alignment with best practices across applications.

Designed and optimized backend microservices for a global e-commerce platform using **Java** (Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA) and **Docker**, ensuring high availability, low latency, and scalability across key modules like checkout, cart, and order fulfillment.
Engineered real-time features using **Redis** and event-driven architecture, enabling responsive order updates, dynamic inventory tracking, and real-time customer support.
Developed frontend applications using **Angular** (version **12**) and integrated it with backend services, delivering fast, responsive user experiences.
Leveraged **PostgreSQL** for distributed data storage, ensuring fast, fault-tolerant data access for high-traffic e-commerce workflows.
Implemented architectural best practices ensuring adherence to **SOLID** principles and **Design Patterns** across the codebase, enhancing maintainability and scalability.
Created automated testing environments with **JUnit** and **Test Containers**, achieving **95%** code coverage and increasing confidence in deployments.
Implemented feature flags and blue-green deployments using **Kubernetes**, enabling controlled rollouts, A/B testing, and risk mitigation during major platform updates.
Ensured secure customer access using **OAuth2** for authentication processes, adhering to GDPR compliance and user data protection standards throughout the platform.
Led Agile development practices with tools like **JIRA** to prioritize backlog, optimize team collaboration, and deliver major features within **2-week** sprints, significantly improving team efficiency.
Fostered strong communication and leadership skills within cross-functional teams to drive project deliverables and ensure alignment with business goals.
